import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./DevHome.css" import ContentleftPanel from './ContentleftPanel' import ContentBlogs from './ContentBlogs' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FaUser } from "react-icons/fa" import IndividualDescription from './IndividualDescription' const DevHome = (props) => { let contentWritings = props.contentWritings; const [search, setSearch] = useState(''); let contentDisplay = contentWritings.filter((content) => { if (search == "") return content else if (content.head.toLowerCase().includes(search.toLowerCase())) return content }).map((content, key) => ( )) return ( <>
CodeBlogs

(setSearch(e.target.value))} value={search} placeholder='Search...' className='devHome_search' />
